reviewText: Both, the title and the art cover of this movie are misleading - there are no ninjas, those are not even mentioned anywhere or seen (perhaps like true ninjas, there were super invisible, all the time).The impression from the movie is so so. The plot is dull as hundred thousands of other action movies united with the same primitive plot (will not spoil your view, as you are supposed to reveal what-is-going-on after the first 50 minutes, though everything will be already clear after the first 10 minutes - it is that badly directed).Fights are mediocre, as hands and legs will be moved in the air most of the time hardly touching anything around with everyone somehow seriously injured.I put 2 stars instead of 1 because the lady that fights there - Luxia Jiang, is one of the most talented female martial artists of our time. It's just too bad, the movie she is in - got bad action choreography, bad acting, bad plot, bad title - bad everything.If you enjoyed this movie, then here are similar ones you might like to consider:Kill 'Em All,The Raid: Redemption UnratedandBKO: Bangkok Knockout. As for fans of Luxia Jiang, I recommendNaked Soldier DVD 2012andKing Of Triads.
Title: Ninja Masters

reviewText: This movie does not match the cover of the cover art, though it was not a bad movie, but the content has nothing to do with NINJA MASTERS, therefore the owner of this deceit me.
Title: Ninja Masters

reviewText: There are no ninjas in this film. I suppose that the U.S. distributor saw the name "Kosug" and decided to go for fans of his father, which is a pity. The film is actually a straight martial arts cheapie, filmed with available architecture (instead of expensive sets) and with minimal plot of the "lured into underground fighting" type. On that basis, it isn't too bad. About on the level of KARATE GIRL or THE KICK, say. I'm not sorry that I bought it, I just wish that Lions Gate had been more honest about the content.
summary: No Ninjas, but not bad of type.
Title: Ninja Masters

reviewText: This DVD is a waste. There is no ninja in even one scene. Please refrain from buying this DVD. Story is boring...only thing its good for is falling asleep while watching it. Kane Kosugi you have ended your career with this exploit of the word Ninja. Again don't waste your money on this DVD.
Title: Ninja Masters

reviewText: This Movie Was Off The Hook Really Enjoyed It Alot especially Seeing That It Had Kane Kosugi In It. Really Loved His Father Movies So Glad To See That He Followed In His Footsteps.
Title: Ninja Masters
